newsitem.title: ESTONIA: NELIMET PICKED AS EMEX PRIVATISATION WINNER.
newsitem.headline: NELIMET PICKED AS EMEX PRIVATISATION WINNER.

text.p: The Estonian privatisation agency on Wednesday picked Nelimet to privatise 51 percent of the shares in the Estonian metal export company (EMEX).
"The winner is Nelimet and the runner-up HKS GmbH Handelgesellschaft," the spokesperson for the agency told Reuters.
Nelimet, owned by EMEX's present management, had the biggest bid sum, the spokesperson said. He added that the preservation of local management and a sound business plan were also taken into account.
Nelimet is to sign the agreement in 30 days.
